DataManipulation

Class Borrower

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataManipulation.Borrower

  • public class Borrower
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the actions, and the information of borrowers (students)

      • Borrower

        public Borrower(java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String phoneNum,
                java.lang.String email)
        Constructor with arguments. It is used to set up new books on the database.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the students first name.
        lastName - the students last name.
        address - the students address.
        phoneNum - the students phone number.
        email - the students email.

      • Borrower

        public Borrower(int cardID,
                java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String phoneNum,
                java.lang.String email)
        Constructor with arguments. It is used to display students from data base. Not to setup new ones.
        Parameters:
        cardID - the students id number.
        firstName - the students first name.
        lastName - the students last name.
        address - the students address.
        phoneNum - the students phone number.
        email - the students email.

      • searchBorrowers

        public int searchBorrowers(int cardID)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        This searches for a student in the data base using the students id number.
        Parameters:
        cardID - the students id number.
        Returns:
        an integer specifying if the query was successful.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If connection to the data base failed.
